title: Pad Man
short_cast: Akshay Kumar, Sonam Kapoor, Radhika Apte, Jyoti Subhash, Urmila Mahanta, Suneel Sinha, Sanjay Singh, Rakesh Chaturvedi Om
cast: Akshay Kumar, Sonam Kapoor, Radhika Apte, Jyoti Subhash, Urmila Mahanta, Suneel Sinha, Sanjay Singh, Rakesh Chaturvedi Om
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Movies Based on Real Life, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: Despite public humiliation and resistance, an entrepreneur markets a hygienic, low-cost sanitary pad that even India's poorest women can afford.
